alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, southeastern Lafayette, eastern Vermilion and west central St. Martin Parishes through 1000 PM CDT... At 920 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Martinville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Loreauville, Cade, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Coteau and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
